challenge_feedback: no. it takes too long to read.

general_feedback: I don't think it an improvement over ordinary Capchas. And a test of English would be off-putting and unfair for loads of people word-wide

challenge_feedback: as a language lover, I wouldn't mind this sort of challenge, but image-captcha is likely much quicker to solve, and more accessible to users who are not English C2 speakers
No, I would neither prefer nor dislike it
No. Clicking on little squares is more fun.
